business_rules.name: Business Rules Validation
business_rules.description: Evaluate business rules for clarity, completeness, and testability

clarity.description: The business rule is clear and unambiguous

completeness.description: The business rule covers all necessary scenarios
evaluation_points: Rule is comprehensive for its scope

testability.description: The business rule can be tested and validated

consistency.description: The business rule is consistent with other rules
evaluation_points: Rule doesn't conflict with other rules

technical_requirements.name: Technical Requirements Validation
technical_requirements.description: Evaluate technical requirements for feasibility, specificity, and implementation clarity

feasibility.description: The technical requirement is feasible to implement
evaluation_points: Requirement uses existing or available technology

specificity.description: The technical requirement is specific and detailed
evaluation_points: Specific technologies or methods are mentioned

completeness.description: The technical requirement is complete and comprehensive
evaluation_points: All necessary technical aspects are covered

maintainability.description: The technical requirement supports maintainable implementation

performance.description: The technical requirement considers performance implications

architecture_components.name: Architecture Components Validation
architecture_components.description: Evaluate architecture components for appropriateness and integration

appropriateness.description: The architecture component is appropriate for the requirement

integration.description: The architecture component integrates well with existing systems

security.description: The architecture component includes security considerations

integration_points.name: Integration Points Validation
integration_points.description: Evaluate integration points for clarity, feasibility, and completeness

clarity.description: The integration point is clearly defined

feasibility.description: The integration point is feasible to implement

completeness.description: The integration point specification is complete

reliability.description: The integration point supports reliable operation

data_entities.name: Data Entities Validation
data_entities.description: Evaluate data entities for completeness, consistency, and usability

completeness.description: The data entity definition is complete

consistency.description: The data entity is consistent with existing data models

usability.description: The data entity supports the intended use cases

maintainability.description: The data entity supports maintainable data management

validation_rules.name: Validation Rules Validation
validation_rules.description: Evaluate validation rules for completeness, accuracy, and testability

completeness.description: The validation rule covers all necessary validation scenarios

accuracy.description: The validation rule accurately validates the intended criteria

testability.description: The validation rule can be effectively tested
evaluation_points: Test cases can be clearly defined
